insertDoctor: INSERT INTO pantax.doctors (name, prof_stat, pract_name, picture_url) VALUES (? , ? , ?, ?)
updateDoctor: UPDATE pantax.doctors set name=?, prof_stat=?, pract_name=?, picture_url=? where id=?
findDoctorByCategory: SELECT d.* FROM pantax.doctors d inner join pantax.doctor_category dc on d.id = dc.doctor_id WHERE dc.category_id = ?
updateDoctorAppointmentOption: UPDATE pantax.doctor_appointment_options SET from_date = ?, to_date = ? WHERE id = ?
getDoctorAppointmentOptions: SELECT id,week_day, from_time, duration FROM pantax.doctor_appointment_options WHERE doctor_id = ?
updatePatient: UPDATE pantax.patient SET name=? WHERE id=?
insertAppointment: INSERT INTO pantax.appointments (patient_id, from_date, to_date) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
getMultipleDoctorAppOptions: select * from doctor_appointment_options where id in (inreplace)
